name.ca: Nota de Gmail per a Drive
name.fil: Tandaan ng Gmail Para sa Drive
name.th: หมายเหตุ Gmail สำหรับไดรฟ์
name.vi: Ghi chú của Gmail cho Drive

short.ar: أضف ملاحظات إلى سلاسل البريد الإلكتروني في Gmail و Inbox. حفظ في Google Drive
short.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,: Add notes to email threads in Gmail and Inbox. Save to Google Drive
short.bg: Добавете бележки към имейл теми в Gmail и Inbox. Запазване в Google Диск
short.ca: Afegiu notes als fils de correu electrònic de Gmail i Inbox. Desa a Google Drive
short.cs: Přidejte poznámky do e-mailových vláken v Gmailu a Doručené poště. Uložit na Disk Google
short.da: Føj noter til e-mail-tråde i Gmail og Indbakke. Gem på Google Drev
short.de: Fügen Sie Notizen zu E-Mail-Threads in Google Mail und im Posteingang hinzu. In Google Drive speichern
short.el: Προσθέστε σημειώσεις σε νήματα email στο Gmail και στα Εισερχόμενα. Αποθήκευση στο Google Drive
short.es: Agregue notas a las conversaciones de correo electrónico en Gmail e Inbox. Guardar en Google Drive
short.et: Lisage märkmeid Gmaili ja Inboxi meililõngadele. Salvesta Google Drive'i
short.fa: یادداشت ها را به موضوعات ایمیل در Gmail و Inbox اضافه کنید. ذخیره در Google Drive
short.fi: Lisää muistiinpanoja sähköpostiketjuihin Gmailissa ja Inboxissa. Tallenna Google Driveen
short.fil: Magdagdag ng mga tala sa mga thread ng email sa Gmail at Inbox. I-save sa Google Drive
short.fr: Ajoutez des notes aux fils de discussion dans Gmail et Inbox. Enregistrer sur Google Drive
short.he: הוסף הערות לשרשורי הדוא"ל ב- Gmail וב- Inbox. שמור ב- Google Drive
short.hi: Gmail और Inbox में ईमेल थ्रेड में नोट्स जोड़ें। Google डिस्क पर सहेजें
short.hr: Dodajte bilješke u niti e-pošte u Gmailu i Inboxu. Spremi na Google disk
short.hu: Jegyzeteket adhat az e-mail szálakhoz a Gmailben és az Inboxban. Mentés a Google Drive-ra
short.id: Tambahkan catatan ke utas email di Gmail dan Inbox. Simpan ke Google Drive
short.it: Aggiungi note ai thread di posta elettronica in Gmail e Inbox. Salva su Google Drive
short.ja: Gmailと受信トレイのメールスレッドにメモを追加します。 Googleドライブに保存
short.ko: Gmail 및 Inbox의 이메일 스레드에 메모를 추가합니다. Google 드라이브에 저장
short.lt: Pridėkite pastabų prie el. Pašto gijų „Gmail“ ir „Inbox“. Išsaugoti „Google“ diske
short.lv: Pievienojiet piezīmes e-pasta pavedieniem pakalpojumos Gmail un Inbox. Saglabāt Google diskā
short.ms: Tambahkan nota ke utas email di Gmail dan Peti Masuk Simpan ke Google Drive
short.nl: Voeg notities toe aan e-mailthreads in Gmail en Inbox. Opslaan in Google Drive
short.no: Legg til notater i e-posttråder i Gmail og Innboks. Lagre på Google Disk
short.pl: Dodawaj notatki do wątków e-maili w Gmailu i Inboxie. Zapisz na Dysku Google
short.ro: Adăugați note la firele de e-mail din Gmail și Inbox. Salvați pe Google Drive
short.ru: Добавляйте заметки в цепочки писем в Gmail и Inbox. Сохранить на Google Диск
short.sk: Pridajte poznámky do e-mailových vlákien v službách Gmail a Doručená pošta. Uložiť na Disk Google
short.sl: Dodajte opombe v e-poštne niti v Gmailu in Inboxu. Shrani v Google Drive
short.sr: Додајте напомене у нити е-поште у Гмаил-у и Инбок-у. Сачувај на Гоогле диску
short.sv: Lägg till anteckningar i e-posttrådar i Gmail och Inbox. Spara på Google Drive
short.th: เพิ่มบันทึกในชุดข้อความอีเมลใน Gmail และ Inbox บันทึกลงใน Google Drive
short.tr: Gmail ve Inbox'ta e-posta dizilerine notlar ekleyin. Google Drive'a Kaydet
short.uk: Додайте нотатки до ланцюжків електронної пошти в Gmail та Inbox. Зберегти на Google Диску
short.vi: Thêm ghi chú vào chuỗi email trong Gmail và Inbox. Lưu vào Google Drive
short.zh_CN: 在Gmail和Inbox中的电子邮件线程中添加注释。保存到Google云端硬盘
short.zh_TW: 在Gmail和Inbox中的電子郵件線程中添加註釋。保存到Google雲端硬盤

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,:
Add notes to email threads in Gmail and Inbox.

- Store Notes in YOUR OWN Google Drive

- 100% Free and Open Source

- Add Notes to your Calendar

- Show Notes in Email Summary Page

- Supports Google Chrome

- Supports Multiple Gmail Accounts in Same Browser

- Support Sharing to Mobile Devices

- Show the Notes During Email Printing

Add annotations on your emails to remember something, or to coach how to craft a good email.
Add sticky notes to your emails today.

Perfect for:
✔️ Lawyers
✔️ Assistants
✔️ Editors
✔️ Sales Managers
✔️ Project Managers
✔️ Customer Representatives
✔️ Anyone who needs to make a mental note about an email that they received.
long.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,:
Add notes to email threads in Gmail and Inbox.

- Store Notes in your OWN Google Drive
- 100% Free
- Add Notes to your Calendar
- Show Notes in Email Summary Page
- Supports Google Chrome
- Supports Multiple Gmail Accounts in Same Browser
- Support Sharing to Mobile Devices
- Show the Notes During Email Printing

Add annotations on your emails to remember something, or to coach how to craft a good email.
Add sticky notes to your emails today.

Perfect for:
✔️ Lawyers
✔️ Assistants
✔️ Editors
✔️ Sales Managers
✔️ Project Managers
✔️ Customer Representatives
✔️ Anyone who needs to make a mental note about an email that they received.

Gmail is a trademark of Google Inc. The use of the trademark is subject to Google’s permission.
 This extension is neither endorsed by or affiliated with Google. 
This extension Gmail Notes is made by a third party developer.
